member.name: M:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.Tests.StoreBridgeClassTests.BrobizzCustomersDiscount_CarTest
member.summary: Testing the price a car that has a brobizz pays - the car gets a brobizz discount of 5% and pays 228kr.

member.name: M:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.Tests.StoreBridgeClassTests.BrobizzCustomersDiscount_CarTest_NoBBZ
member.summary: Testing the price a car that has no brobizz pays - the car does NOT get a brobizz discount. A full price of 240kr is paid.

member.name: M:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.Tests.StoreBridgeClassTests.BrobizzCustomersDiscount_MCTest
member.summary: A motorbike with a brobizz gets a 5% discount on the bridge and pays 118.75kr.

member.name: M:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.Tests.StoreBridgeClassTests.BrobizzCustomersDiscount_MCTest_NoBBZ
member.summary: A motorbike WITHOUT a brobizz does NOT get 5% discount on the bridge and pays 125kr.

member.name: M:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.Tests.StoreBridgeClassTests.WeekendBroBizzCustomersPrice_CarTest
member.summary: A car witha brobizz crossing the bridge on a Saturday gets both discounts. Thus the price paid by the car after the discounts is 182.4kr.

member.name: M:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.Tests.StoreBridgeClassTests.WeekendBroBizzCustomersPrice_CarTest1_Sunday_BBZ
member.summary: A car without brobizz crossing the bridge on a Sunday gets the weekend discount only discounts. Thus the price paid by the car after the discounts is 192kr.

member.name: M:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.Tests.StoreBridgeClassTests.WeekendBroBizzCustomersPrice_CarTest1_Sunday_MC
member.summary: A motorbike with a Brobizz crossing the bridge on a weekend receives no weekend discount and has but recieves the 5% discount for the Brobizz. The pice is therfore 118.75kr.

member.name: M:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.Tests.StoreBridgeClassTests.WeekendBroBizzCustomersPrice_CarTest1_Sunday_MC_NoBBZ
member.summary: A mototbike without a Brobizz crossing the bridge on a weekend recives no discount and has pay the fuull price 210kr.
